original_text: When Ahimelech's son Abiathar had run away, he had come to David at Keilah. And he had brought the priests' ephod with him.
korean_text: 아히멜렉의 아들 아비아달이 그일라 다윗에게로 도망할 때에 손에 에봇을 가지고 내려왔더라

sentences.original_text: When Ahimelech's son Abiathar had run away
he had come to David at Keilah
And he had brought the priests' ephod with him
